iterations.yara_rule:
rule Bypass_Sample
{
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rule"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { 55 8B EC FF 75 08 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 59 } // push ebp; mov ebp, esp; push dword ptr [ebp+08h]; call <offset>; pop ecx;
        $pattern1 = { 64 A1 30 00 00 00 8B 40 68 C1 E8 08 A8 01 75 10 } // mov eax, dword ptr fs:[00000030h]; mov eax, dword ptr [eax+68h]; shr eax, 08h; test al, 01h; jne
        $pattern2 = { 55 8B FF 55 8B 75 08 FF 15 ?? ?? ?? ?? } // push ebp; mov edi, edi; push ebp; mov esi, edi; push dword ptr [ebp+08h]; call <address>

    condition:
        any of them
}
iterations.failure_reason: Rule hit but no new signatures
improvement_suggestions: Remove the `skip` action entirely from the YARA rule. The goal is to

iterations.raw_response:
```yara
rule Bypass_Sample
{
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rule"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { 55 8B EC FF75 08 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 59 } // push ebp; mov ebp, esp; push dword ptr [ebp+08h]; call <offset>; pop ecx;
        $pattern1 = { 64 A1 30 00 00 00 8B 40 68 C1 E8 08 A8 01 75 10 } // mov eax, dword ptr fs:[00000030h]; mov eax, dword ptr [eax+68h]; shr eax, 08h; test al, 01h; jne
        $pattern2 = { 55 8B FF 55 8B 75 08 FF15 ?? ?? ?? ?? } // push ebp; mov edi, edi; push ebp; mov esi, edi; push dword ptr [ebp+08h]; call <address>

    condition:
        any of them
}
```
